Columns.Name: PromotionId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Promotion.

Columns.Name: Sales Organisation
Columns.Description: Company or Unit Identifier/Description

Columns.Name: Distribution Channel
Columns.Description: Distribution channel in terms of the sales organization - Digital or stores

Columns.Name: Location ID
Columns.Description: Location ID at which the Promotion is active {Store ID, Store group ID, Price zone ID, Sales Org id}

Columns.Name: SKU Identifier
Columns.Description: Unique identifier of every stock keeping unit

Columns.Name: Promo Start Date
Columns.Description: Date on which the promotion was started

Columns.Name: Promo End Date
Columns.Description: Date on which the promotion ended

Columns.Name: Promo Campaign
Columns.Description: Campaign associated with the promotional SKU

Columns.Name: Promo Event
Columns.Description: Event of the campaign, associated with the promotional SKU

Columns.Name: Promo Type
Columns.Description: The promotion type of the SKU

Columns.Name: Promo Parameter 1
Columns.Description: Promotion Parameter 1. For example, B2G3

Columns.Name: Promo Parameter 2
Columns.Description: Promotion Parameter 2. For example, Minimum Order Quantity of 2

Columns.Name: Promo Parameter 3
Columns.Description: Promotion Parameter 3 if any

Columns.Name: Promo display
Columns.Description: Y/N to indicate if the SKU is positioned in a promotion display

Columns.Name: Promotional flyer
Columns.Description: Y/N to indicate if the SKU is advertised in a promotion flyer

Columns.Name: Promotional mailer
Columns.Description: Y/N to indicate if the SKU was in the promotion mailer

Columns.Name: Clearance flag
Columns.Description: ampaign associated with the promotional SKU

Columns.Name: Promo price
Columns.Description: Promo price of the SKU

Columns.Name: Performance Factor1
Columns.Description: If additional information is available, these fields can be used to store that info

Columns.Name: Performance Factor2
Columns.Description: If additional information is available, these fields can be used to store that info

Columns.Name: Performance Factor3
Columns.Description: If additional information is available, these fields can be used to store that info

properties.Name: Promotion
